thread.title: Uttar Pradesh 2017: Prime Minister Narendra Modi to address a rally in Aligarh
thread.title_full: Uttar Pradesh 2017: Prime Minister Narendra Modi to address a rally in Aligarh

author: FE Online
title: Uttar Pradesh 2017: Prime Minister Narendra Modi to address a rally in Aligarh
text:
Uttar Pradesh 2017: Prime Minister Narendra Modi to address a rally in Aligarh Uttar Pradesh 2017: Prime Minister Narendra Modi to address a rally in Aligarh The Uttar Pradesh elections' campaign took a new turn after PM Narendra Modi addressed rally in Meerut on Saturday and took a dig at the opposition parties. By: FE Online | New Delhi | Published: February 5, 2017 9:11 AM Taking pot shots at Akhilesh Yadav’s Samajwadi Party, Mayawati and Rahul Gandhi, Modi said that SCAM is an abbreviation for Samajwadi Party, Congress, Akhilesh Yadav and Mayawati. (PTI) 
Prime Minister Narendra Modi will address a rally in Aligarh on Sunday, reported ANI. The Uttar Pradesh elections’ campaign took a new turn after PM Narendra Modi addressed rally in Meerut on Saturday and took a dig at the opposition parties. Taking pot shots at Akhilesh Yadav ’s Samajwadi Party, Mayawati and Rahul Gandhi , Modi said that SCAM is an abbreviation for Samajwadi Party, Congress , Akhilesh Yadav and Mayawati. Uttar Pradesh elections, after more than a month long Samajwadi Party feud and Akhilesh Yadav going on to form an alliance with Congress had already set the tone for the elections and now with Narendra Modi taking a strong stand against the opposition parties and making serious accusations against them has further made the elections interesting. 
In his Meerut rally, Modi had also announced schemes of farmers and had assured the voters that his party his pro poor and if elected to power, would be able to provide help more closely than it is able to do now, from Delhi. Please Wait while comments are loading...
